text:
Sorry so long to get back.
Thanks for the reply :slightly_smiling_face:

I’ve added a new idea (even though it’s a bug IMHO). Basically, you can’t re-subscribe via Marketing API - however you can do this easily if you use a link from any HubSpot marketing e-mail.

Additionally, Marketing API doesn’t have a way to unsubscribe from all e-mails.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-a-way-to-re-subscribe-and-unsubscribe-from-all-e-mail/idi-p/596625>

it's not a bug, it's the expected behaviour, imagine if someone use your email address to subscribe you to their mailing list, you receive your first email, you unsubscribe manually from the link in the footer, then they keep re-subscribing you via API, that's not GDPR compliant
Yeah, HubSpot has things in place to prevent constantly re-subscribing contacts.
